summary: Robin Hood is a famous character from English folklore. He was an outlaw who stole from the rich and gave to the poor. Known for his archery and sword-fighting skills, Robin Hood is often portrayed wearing green clothing. The legend has evolved over time, with different versions depicting him as a noble or a commoner. His story includes characters like Maid Marian and the Merry Men, and their main enemy, the Sheriff of Nottingham. Robin Hood's popularity dates back to the Middle Ages, and he remains a well-known folk hero, inspiring books, plays, and movies.
title: Robin Hood
